tool_description: Monitors and tracks response times and performance metrics for chat support quality assessment.

event_type.description: Event to track: message_received, response_sent, escalated, resolved

error_messages: Invalid event_type: Use one of [message_received, response_sent, escalated, resolved]
Invalid timestamp: Must be valid ISO 8601 date-time format
Tracking failed: Unable to record performance metric
usage: Provide session_id, event_type, and timestamp for each tracked event. Include agent_id when applicable for agent-specific metrics.

response_time.description: Time elapsed since last customer message in seconds

performance_score.description: Performance rating: excellent, good, average, poor
